items.q: What’s included in a bond clean?
items.a: Kitchen (including oven), bathrooms and grout, internal windows/sills/tracks, cupboards/drawers in/out, skirtings and switches, reachable fans/vents, and all floors. We finish with a daylight detail pass for marks and edges.

Paint repairs, silicone or structural fixes, unsafe exterior access, pest control, and specialist stain removal unless scoped as add-ons. Tell us if carpets or external windows are required by your lease.
Small unit: ~3–6 hours. Larger homes take longer. Add time for heavy ovens, many blinds, internal windows/tracks, and carpet steam cleaning.

items.q: Do you guarantee my bond back?
items.a: We provide 7-day re-clean support aligned to your property manager’s feedback. If something’s missed within the window, we return and fix it.

items.q: Do I need to be home?
items.a: No—just ensure power and water are on and we have access (keys, codes, parking). We’ll update you and confirm when done.
Fixed quotes based on size, condition and add-ons. If the home differs materially from your brief, we’ll confirm any change before work—no surprises.

items.q: Do you clean reachable external windows?
items.a: Yes, as an add-on where safe and reachable from ground level. High-risk access isn’t included.

items.q: What if the agent asks for changes?
items.a: Send their list. We’ll schedule a re-clean within 7 days and target the exact items they flagged.
